channel.title: Lectures on COMP4187 – Parallel Scientific Computing II
channel.description: Recent content in Lectures on COMP4187 – Parallel Scientific Computing II

item.title: Lecture 1: FD
item.description: The lecture will take place over zoom. A calender invite is available on duo. The zoom invite can also be found at info). Before the lecture it would be good if you can download the ipython notebook and run it. You can see jupyter for instructions on how to run the notebook. Alternatively, you can run the notebook online without installing python. finite-differences After the lecture a video recording has been placed on duo.

item.title: Lecture 2: FD
item.description: For this lecture we continued with ipython notebook. The notebook is also available online without installing python. finite-differences After the lecture a video recording has been placed on duo. The video is now available at: video

item.title: Lecture 3: FD
item.description: We will be moving on to the next notebook during the next lecture. Before the lecture it would be good if you can download the next ipython notebook and run it. You can see jupyter for instructions on how to run the notebook. Alternatively, you can run the notebook online without installing python. finite-differences The video is now available at: video The content of the whiteboard can be found below.

item.title: Lecture 4: Smoothers
item.description: In this lecture we will finish covering efficient matrix storage from: ipython notebook. Alternatively, you can run the notebook online without installing python. finite-differences After that we will start discussing efficient solvers for linear systems. This lecture will cover smoothers: ipython notebook. Alternatively, you can run the notebook online without installing python. smoothers-intro After the lecture have a look at the corresponding exercise. The video is now available at: video

item.title: Lecture 5: Smoothers
item.description: This lecture will cover smoothers: ipython notebook. Alternatively, you can run the notebook online without installing python. smoothers-intro
